Row.Text: For this Age, gain +15% CULTURE[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] at the cost of -10% Science[icon:YIELD_Science]
For this Age, gain +15% Science[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] at the cost of -10% Culture[icon:YIELD_CULTURE]
Libraries become Yuni's Libraries (They retain their base yields, adjacency bonuses, and effects in the next age).
